oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sounds of Nashville Music at Opry House (18522)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tubb, Justin; Davis, Skeeter; Grandpa Jones; Paycheck, Johnny; Prophet, Ronnie; Smith, Connie, 1941-; Speer Family (Musical group); Stoneman Family (Musical group); Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Walker, Ray; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing a Benefit Show for the Middle Tennessee Mental Health Institute featuring Skeeter Davis, Grandpa Jones, Johnny Paycheck, Ronnie Prophet, Connie Smith, Speer Family, Stonemans, Ernest Tubb, 21st Century, New World, Dr. Hook, and Ray Walker at the Opry House on March 1. Poster features metal photoplates of some of the singers. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/45254/
